'''''Culminate! Chatter of Joyous Dreams''''' is an [[Event Quest]] during the [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!]] event.

==Steps==
# Wait until the following day (08:00 â€“ 10:00)
# Go to [[Caravan Ribat]] and find out the truth of the Card Snatcher
# Go to the delivery address with [[Kirara]]
# Find a hiding place
# Defeat all opponents {{Enemy List|1=Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist{ text = Dedebaba };Treasure Hoarders: Scout{ text = Pabag };Treasure Hoarders: Scout{ text = Papak } }}
# Go to [[Vimara Village]] to deliver the package
# Ask [[Zadith]] about the whereabouts of the scholar
# Ask [[Arezo]] about the whereabouts of the scholar
# Ask the village head about the whereabouts of the scholar
# Go to the house and talk to [[Garvipidam]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* During Step 5, Kirara joins the party as a trial character.

:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' "Oh, and for those of you without Sumpter Beasts..."

:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 pabag 08.ogg}} '''Pabag:''' Hey, whaddya mean "waste"!? That message will mobilize the Treasure Hoarders!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 papak 13.ogg}} '''Papak:''' H&mdash;He's right, the time and other details are printed below that.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Let Paimon see... Oh, there it is!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 01.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Hmm, objectively speaking, it's definitely a creative method of communicating information.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 02.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' But then why were you trying to retrieve these card backs?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 pabag 09.ogg}} '''Pabag:''' It's all because some fellow hoarders got addicted to Genius Invokation!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 pabag 10.ogg}} '''Pabag:''' All they needed to do was stick to the plan, but they couldn't help themselves and started playing the game! Not only that, they were even using our card backs and showing 'em off!

:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 03.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Ah, you were afraid that your plans would be exposed, so you dispatched members to quickly retrieve the card backs that had been scattered into the markets.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 papak 14.ogg}} '''Papak:''' Not just the ones on the markets, we collected ALL our treasure chest card backs and we had them shipped back.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 papak 15.ogg}} '''Papak:''' We feared that our plans had already been discovered, so we were preparing to print another set of card backs. They would indicate a different time to initiate the operation, and we'd redistribute them...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 papak 16.ogg}} '''Papak:''' But to take every precaution, we raised funding for everyone to send us the backs via Komaniya Express. That way, we could guarantee the card backs would arrive safely and on time.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 02.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Huh? Oh, uh thanks for the compliments...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 04.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' So the senders would stay at their original location to ensure that the operation could continue moving forward.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 05.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Now that I think about it, that must be why the Treasure Hoarders came after the person who sold the card back in Mondstadt.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, right! It's no wonder we were running into the Treasure Hoarders left and right. They wanted to be sure that anyone involved stayed quiet.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 papak 17.ogg}} '''Papak:''' There, I told you everything I know. Hopefully that will help us make up for our mistakes... Please, Mahamatra Cyno, show us mercy!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 07.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' You'll each receive your due punishment. Enough talk, come with me.
:{{Black Screen|You follow Cyno back to Caravan Ribat...}}
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 08.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' I've taken care of the criminals for now. I'll be escorting them back to Sumeru City shortly.
:{{DIcon}} Thanks for all your help.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 09.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' I was only fulfilling my duty. You all did well.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 06.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' (Cyno seems like a completely different person when he's working.)

:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 07.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Oh, wait wait wait! I still wanna interview the champion of the Sumeru regional tournament.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 11.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Alright, go ahead.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 08.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Tell me, Mr. Cyno, what were your thoughts about the tournament? And did you have anything to say about the Treasure Hoarder incident?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 12.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Hmm...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 13.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Genius Invokation TCG is a very good game. But to me, it's not just a game, it's an art form. It allows people to meet others, make friends, and experience the joy of dueling together.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 14.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' I hope everyone can have the chance to experience the fun of playing this game.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 09.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Great answer. That'll be a perfect ending for my news piece.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 15.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Therefore, I assure you that I will personally bring judgment to any criminals out there with delusions of desecrating this game with their evil plans. No matter where you run, or where you hide, you will not escape the punishment of lightning.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 10.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Oh! Ahem, I see... Let's stay calm, no need to get worked up.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 11.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Now let me think...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 12.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Hmm... "Not-So-Genius Thieves Behind Mysterious Treasure-Chest Card Back Plot Finally"... umm...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 16.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' "Got decked..." You get it, like cards and punching?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 13.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Yes, that'll work nicely!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' These two make quite the team when it comes to words.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 17.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' If that's all, then I should get going.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 18.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' I'll inform the other areas not to get gamed by these thieving Treasure Hoarders.
:{{DIcon}} Take care, Cyno.
:{{DIcon}} Let's play a game of Genius Invokation next time.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 cyno 19.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' We will.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So in the end, it turned out that the group of card snatchers we were tracking was the Treasure Hoarders all along.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Still feels a little disappointing though... Paimon thought for sure those card backs would lead us to some valuable treasure.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 14.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Don't say that. Think of the bright side, we uncovered a major international crime scheme!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 15.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' I definitely have everything I need for my exclusive news piece.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' If anything, Paimon regrets that we didn't get to see the mysterious inventors of Genius Invokation TCG.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 03.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Hehe, it seems everyone can't stop talking about that game.
:{{DIcon}} It's just fun to play cards.
:{{DIcon}} It's fun to meet new friends.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 04.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' In that case, how would everyone like to join me for a very special delivery?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? You mean it's related to Genius Invokation TCG?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 05.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Mm-hmm, that's right. You'll understand when we get there.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 06.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' I would have invited Cyno along too if he wasn't busy with work.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 16.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Oh really? But didn't you say before that you can't disclose customer information?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 07.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yeah, but this time the situation's different.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 08.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Let's just say, this delivery wasn't assigned to me by the company.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 09.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' This package had been sitting at the company for some time because we couldn't ever locate the recipient. Even the neighbors didn't know where he went.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, so the company eventually took ownership of the package?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 10.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yep, the holding period passed just last month.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 17.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' But can't you just return it to the original sender?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 11.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Well, it turns out the sender has passed away.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 17.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, that's terrible...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 12.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yeah, and I thought both the original sender and intended recipient would be disappointed if this package is left undelivered.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 13.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' So I took the initiative and started asking around Sumeru in my free time. Eventually, I found out where the recipient went, and also learned a little about his past.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 18.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wow, amazing! So who is it?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 14.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Well... Hehe, you'll have to come with me and see.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 15.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' I have a feeling that it'll be good to have some true Genius Invokation TCG players like you come along.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 charlotte 18.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Oh, sounds like another news story brewing. I'll tag along, as well.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 19.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh, now Paimon's really curious...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 paimon 20.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What do you think, {{Traveler}}? Shall we join her?
:{{DIcon}} Of course.
:{{DIcon}} It's our duty as TCG players.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 5 kirara 16.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Alright, then follow me to [[Vimara Village]].

;(Talk to Zadith)

:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 zadith 02.ogg}} '''Zadith:''' Oh, yes, there is a scholar around here, but I've never heard anyone go by the name you mentioned.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 zadith 03.ogg}} '''Zadith:''' Are you sure you've got the right name? Actually, I'd like to ask him a few questions myself regarding which of the Six Darshans to join!

;(Talk to Arezo)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey there, we're looking for a scholar named Garvipidam.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 01.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' Garvipidam? Never heard of 'em.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 02.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' Ah, wait. Do you mean that newcomer that arrived a few days ago?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, someone just moved here?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 03.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' Yes, that's right. He looked pretty anxious though, almost like he's struggling to complete a thesis.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 04.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' I've seen him speaking with the village head, probably looking for a place to stay.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 05.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' Vimara Village is the perfect place to take a vacation and relax, which is why I chose to come back here.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Got it, thank you. We'll go talk to the head of the village.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 arezo 06.ogg}} '''Arezo:''' Don't mention it. If life is ever treatin' ya hard, you can always come and live here for a while.

;(Talk to Amadhiah)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hello, are you the head of the village? There's something we'd like to ask you about.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 01.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Yes, that's me. Go ahead.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Do you know where a scholar by the name of Garvipidam lives? We'd like to talk to him.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 02.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Garvipidam? Ah, that must be him...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' You know him?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 03.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Yes, I do. He came here to rent a place to stay. He said he needed to unwind a little.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 04.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' But hardly anyone's ever seen him come out since he moved in, he doesn't seem to be very outgoing.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 05.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' I don't know if that's his way of "unwinding," but I'd say he's just keeping himself cooped up.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 06.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Are you friends of his?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 kirara 01.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yeah, you could say that.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' (Hmm? Her tails are moving again. Is that what happens whenever she tells a lie?)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 07.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Ah, I see. I was thinking that it'd be good for some friends to check up on him.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 08.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' He's staying up above, look for the house in the corner. You should be able to find him there.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Great, thank you very much!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 7 amadhiah 09.ogg}} '''Amadhiah:''' Don't mention it. I just want to see people who come here be happy.

;(Approach the house)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' This is the place. Let's try knocking and see if he answers.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hello? Anybody home? We're looking for Garvipidam.
:'''Garvipidam:''' ...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 01.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Yes, that's me. Can I help you?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 01.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Hello Mr. Garvipidam, I'm Kirara. I have a delivery from Komaniya Express... I'm afraid the package is quite late.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 02.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' A package? For me?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 02.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yes, it's from a Mr. Gulab.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 03.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Wh&mdash;What? Gulab? But how is that possible...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 03.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Yes, it seems your friend submitted the package to our company before he passed.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 04.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Friend? Hah, some friend I am... There was nothing I could do about his illness, and I wasn't by his side during the last moments of his life.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 04.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Don't say that. After all, you and Gulab are the creators of Genius Invokation TCG. I'm sure Gulab would have been happy to know how popular the game has become.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Say what!? He's one of the creators of Genius Invokation TCG!?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 05.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' *sigh* Why... Why does it seem that misfortune always befalls geniuses like him?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 charlotte 01.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' If you don't mind, perhaps you could talk to us about it? It would probably help you feel better.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 06.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' ...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 07.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Hah, you're right. Maybe I should tell you...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 08.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' You really wouldn't mind listening?
:{{DIcon}} Sure, you can talk to us.
:{{DIcon}} You'll feel better.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 09.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Alright then... It's not much of a story, really.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 10.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I knew Gulab ever since we were kids. We were classmates and grew up together.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 11.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Other than the bandages on his arms, you could hardly tell he had [[Eleazar]]. He was always positive, peaceful, and kind...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 12.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Later, we both entered the Akademiya, and he became a [[Rtawahist]] Dastur.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 charlotte 02.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' If I remember correctly, that's a pretty high position.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 13.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Haha. Yes, he really was that smart.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 14.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' But before long, the Eleazar got worse and led to some serious complications.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 15.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' After that, he became bedridden. He received treatment in the hospital, but had to abandon his research.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 16.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I would go see him in the hospital every day, even though he said there was no need for me to visit so often.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 charlotte 03.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' He must have been worried that he was taking time from your own research.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 17.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I know, but I couldn't bear to just leave him like that. He was clearly the smarter of the two of us.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 18.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' We would have some free time whenever I visited him, so we took some cards and started painting them.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 19.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Over time, those cards became the basis for Genius Invokation TCG.
:{{DIcon}} A game that was born from friendship.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 20.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' It's not only a game. When we were designing it, I deliberately incorporated some theoretical knowledge of the elements.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 21.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I was originally waiting for him to recover, so we could study the subject together. But in the end...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Aw, don't be sad. Genius Invokation TCG is the result of your research together.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Not to mention, a lot of people are enjoying it now.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 22.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' *sigh* After he passed away, I tried to play the game with someone else...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 23.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' But every time I looked up, all I could see was his silhouette. It was as if he was still sitting there at the table...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 24.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I know it was all in my head, though...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Aw, Paimon understands. Paimon wouldn't ever be able to get used to being away from {{Traveler}}. Paimon would probably find herself talking to the wind as if the Traveler could hear...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 25.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Yes. Everyone else has told me that I have to move on and embrace the fun of Genius Invokation, saying that I'm one of its creators...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 26.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' But to be honest, without Gulab, what meaning does the game have anymore...?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 05.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Garvipidam, perhaps you should see what your friend sent you in the package.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 27.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Ah, right.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 28.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Hmm!? What's this?&nbsp;...A letter?
;(A [[#Gallery|cinematic]] plays)
::'''Gulab:''' My dear friend, you must be wondering
::'''Gulab:''' Why I'm leaving you a letter like this
::'''Gulab:''' It's because...
::'''Garvipidam:''' Hey, Gulab! I'm here. How are you feeling today?
::'''Garvipidam:''' I gotta tell you, I had an idea for another card last night
::'''Garvipidam:''' Huh? What's that you're writing?
::'''Gulab:''' Haha, it's nothing
::'''Garvipidam:''' Okay... Anyway, up for a game?
::'''Gulab:''' You don't have to visit every day, you know. You should be focusing on your work at the Akademiya...
::'''Garvipidam:''' Hey, enough of that, I'll keep visiting until you've fully recovered
::'''Garvipidam:''' Besides, I can't stand most of the folks at the Akademiya anyway!
::'''Garvipidam:''' Hey, it's your turn
::'''Gulab:''' *coughing*
::'''Garvipidam:''' Gulab!? Are you okay?
::'''Gulab:''' *cough* Garvipidam, you must understand...
::'''Gulab:''' My Eleazar...
::'''Garvipidam:''' Hey! Don't talk like that!
::'''Garvipidam:''' You just need some more rest...
::'''Gulab:''' *sigh*...
::'''Gulab:''' It's because... you won't come to terms with the fact that I don't have long left
::'''Gulab:''' Guess what? This game we invented
::'''Gulab:''' Is getting pretty popular here in the hospital
::'''Garvipidam:''' Really? That's great news!
::'''Gulab:''' Yeah. I've even made a device
::'''Gulab:''' To help people find other players nearby
::'''Gulab:''' Here, this one's for you
::'''Gulab:''' This way, you'll be able to keep playing even after I'm&mdash;
::'''Garvipidam:''' Just stop!
::'''Garvipidam:''' You're gonna get better, you hear me? I don't need this thing... I don't want it!
::'''Gulab:''' I imagine the Casket of Tomes I gave you
::'''Gulab:''' Is probably gathering dust in a corner somewhere...
::'''Gulab:''' So, this is my last gift to you. I'm sorry that I could only give it to you now
::'''Gulab:''' Do you remember when we first met?
::'''Gulab:''' You were the only one willing to be friends with the kid with Eleazar
::'''Gulab:''' Now it's my turn to help you make some new friends
::'''Gulab:''' This way, I'll always be by your side, my friend
:;(Cinematic ends)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 29.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' ...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 30.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Gulab... that rascal... He was always this way...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 kirara 06.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' I haven't played much Genius Invokation myself. All I know is that it has brought joy to a lot of people.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 charlotte 04.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' As a true TCG player put it: "The game allows many people to meet others, make friends, and experience the joy of dueling together."
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That's right! We've seen that firsthand on our journeys recently!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon can tell you those stories if you're interested.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 31.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Thank you all for your kind words.
:{{DIcon}} Good friends never truly leave.
:{{DIcon}} They stay with us in another form.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 32.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' You're right.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 33.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' Haha, Gulab... Is that what you were thinking when you left this letter...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 34.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' I've always kept your Casket of Tomes with me...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 35.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' It was so special for you to draw me a card like this, what a waste it is to never have used it...
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 36.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' If he were here now, I know he'd say.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 8 garvipidam 37.ogg}} '''Garvipidam:''' "Hey friends, how about a game of Genius Invokation TCG?" Well, what do you say?
:{{DIcon}} I'd be happy to.
:{{Black Screen|You play an enjoyable match of Genius Invokation with Garvipidam...}}
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Garvipidam seems to be feeling better. Paimon even saw him crack a smile when he was playing just now.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 01.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' It always takes time to heal from pain from the past, but I think this is a good start for his road to recovery.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! It was a good thing that Kirara kept track of that package, even when they were unable to deliver it.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 kirara 01.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' When my boss asked me to take care of it, I had a feeling that it must somehow be delivered, I couldn't just let it be abandoned.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Would you say that was your youkai intuition kicking in?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 kirara 02.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' Maybe, I'm not sure. I guess I just didn't want to let the sender's sentiment go to waste like that.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 02.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Anyway, I think this is where we'll say goodbye.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, are you going back to Fontaine now?
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 03.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' That's right. Who would have guessed that I'd still get such a quality story after the tournament had finished. It's going to take me a few days just to draft the articles alone.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 04.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Oh, by the way, I still haven't had the chance to interview you two all this time.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 05.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' After all that we've witnessed on this journey together, do you have anything you'd like to say?
:{{DIcon}} We made a lot of new friends...
::{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 05a 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! You could say the best thing we got out of this adventure was the new friends we made!
:{{DIcon}} We learned a lot about Genius Invokation TCG...
::{{A|vo dpeq004 9 paimon 05b 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! We'll never see the game the same way, it means a lot more to us now!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 06.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' I understand. I'll be sure to work your comments into my exclusive news piece.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 07.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Just be sure to buy a copy of The Steambird when you visit Fontaine!
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 kirara 03.ogg}} '''Kirara:''' And I should get ready to head back to Inazuma. I still have to report everything to my boss.
:{{DIcon}} Take care, everyone.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 08.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' Will do! I'm sure we'll all see each other again soon.
:{{A|vo dpeq004 9 charlotte 09.ogg}} '''Charlotte:''' And maybe we'll play Genius Invokation TCG if we have the chance.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Post-Quest Dialogue==
After completing ''Culminate! Chatter of Joyous Dreams'', Diona, Draff, Beidou, Kaedehara Kazuha, Sangonomiya Kokomi and Tighnari can be found and interacted with in different parts of the world.

===Diona and Draff===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Diona or Draff at the Teleport Waypoint next to the bridge leading into Mondstadt City)
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 01.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Hey Dad, want to play a game of Genius Invokation?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 02.ogg}} '''Diona:''' But before we play, I got one thing to say to you! If you're already tipsy from drinking today, then the game will be over in three rounds.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 01.ogg}} '''Draff:''' In three rounds? Sounds like you're underestimating your dear father.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 02.ogg}} '''Draff:''' I'm pretty sure I could drag the game out to at least five rounds.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 03.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Hmph! And you'd still lose! You think that's something to be proud of?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 04.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Last time we played, you mistook the Hydro Elemental Dice you rolled for Cryo! Ugh, so annoying!
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 03.ogg}} '''Draff:''' Haha, you know I have a problem with my eyesight...
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 05.ogg}} '''Diona:''' No, you have a problem with drinking! Don't try to cover it up!
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 04.ogg}} '''Draff:''' Alright, alright, I know, drinking is bad. I won't drink today, not even a single drop. There, happy?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 06.ogg}} '''Diona:''' I guess so.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 05.ogg}} '''Draff:''' Now, if I DO win, what's the prize?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 07.ogg}} '''Diona:''' What? You're trying to get me to mix you a drink? Don't you even think about it!
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 draff 06.ogg}} '''Draff:''' What if I win in under five rounds?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 diona 08.ogg}} '''Diona:''' In your dreams, I won't lose! Let's start!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Beidou and Kaedehara Kazuha===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Beidou or Kaedehara Kazuha at [[Guyun Stone Forest]] near [[Domain of Guyun]])
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 01.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' So, you leave for a few days and come back with some serious TCG skills. Care to explain?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kazuha 01.ogg}} '''Kaedehara Kazuha:''' I was fortunate enough to have played a match with a skilled opponent.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 02.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Oh? And who might that be? Wait, let me try to guess...
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 03.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Ningguang doesn't have the time for this sort of thing... Hmm, Xiangling and Xinyan aren't usually practicing either...
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 04.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' If Yaoyao were free, she'd be running down to the ship to say hi to everyone, so that rules her out.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 05a.ogg}} {{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 05b.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Hah, could it be {{Traveler}}? Did {{MC|m=he|f=she}} happen to be in Liyue Harbor?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kazuha 02a.ogg}} {{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kazuha 02b.ogg}} '''Kaedehara Kazuha:''' Sorry Captain, you still haven't guessed it. But I did happen to see {{Traveler}}, and even forged a new friendship over cards...
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 06.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Oh, made a new friend, huh? Then I won't be able to guess it.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kazuha 03.ogg}} '''Kaedehara Kazuha:''' Yes, I met Hu Tao, director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Have you heard of her?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 07.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Yeah, I've heard of her before. Isn't she the one that won the King of Invokations Grand Prix in Liyue?
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kazuha 04.ogg}} '''Kaedehara Kazuha:''' That's right. She said that she's been an admirer of yours for a long time, and hopes to make your acquaintance one day.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 08.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Alright! There isn't a better opportunity!
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 09.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' We'll invite her aboard to play a few matches, and I'll get a taste of playing against a champion.
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 beidou 10.ogg}} '''Beidou:''' Oh, speaking of which, perhaps I should go find her personally at the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. You know, to show some sincerity.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Sangonomiya Kokomi===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Sangonomiya Kokomi on a cliff near the [[Statue of The Seven]], overlooking [[Watatsumi Island]])
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 01.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Hmm? Oh, did you make the trip all the way back here just to see me?
:{{DIcon}} About the thieves...
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02a 1.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Ah, so that's what you uncovered in the end. Hmm, I'm not quite sure how I feel about that.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02a 2.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' But thank you for letting me know.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02a 3.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Hearing how things ended almost feels like reading the end of a light novel. Now we can all rest at ease.
::;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} About the tournament...
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02b 1.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' "Winning or losing isn't what's most important. It's about playing with elegance." That's how I've always looked at it, anyway.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02b 2.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' After seeing you all cheering for me though, I suppose I really tried to bring my best to the game.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02b 3.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Hehe... Now that I think about it, it was great that I was able to speak with you before the competition.
::{{DIcon}} Energy +5?
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02b 4.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Ah! No, please don't ever mention that to anyone!
::;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} I'll be on my way, then.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02c 1.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Since you came all the way to Watatsumi Island, you might as well rest for a moment before you return.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 kokomi 02c 2.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' I hope this view will stay in your heart forever.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Tighnari===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Tighnari at the [[Teleport Waypoint]] near [[Gandha Hill]])
:{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' {{Traveler}}, what a coincidence! Cyno already told me everything that happened.
:{{DIcon}} About Cyno's unfunny jokes...
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02a 1.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I'll stop you right there! Cyno has already told me countless jokes with that smug look on his face. I don't want to hear any more.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02a 2.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' That's all I have to say on that topic.
::;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} About Genius Invokation TCG...
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02b 1.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Things have been quiet in the Avidya Forest lately, so I've been playing with Collei every now and then.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02b 2.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Collei never ceases to amaze me. She even managed to place well in that tournament.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02b 3.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Even though I was able to make it out of the qualifiers, luck wasn't on my side and I faced Cyno only a few matches in.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02b 4.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' That guy shows no mercy when it comes to Genius Invokation. He even let out a loud yell when he played the winning card... It really hurt my ears.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02b 5.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' It's been a while since I've seen him get so stirred up like that.
::;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} I'll be on my way, then.
::{{A|vo dialog dpeq004 tighnari 02c 1.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' No need to be so polite. You should visit again when you have the time.

;(Use Nahida's All Schemes to Know on Tighnari, optional)
:{{A|vo dpeq004 10 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' (I really didn't see that coming...)
{{Dialogue End}}
